nodes.text: Asuka trees were a type of tree that grew in the hot, muggy jungles of the Outer Rim planet Akiva. The trees had crinkly blue flower blossoms and fat, broad leaves. Near the end of the rebellion on Akiva in 4 ABY, rebel pilot Norra Wexley and her son, Temmin Wexley, traveled to a landing pad that had several asuka trees growing nearby. The day prior to their visit, a storm had blown several of the trees' leaves and flowers onto the ground.
Asuka trees first appeared in Aftermath, a 2015 novel written by Chuck Wendig.
